description:
Desktop GUI for BitLlama LLM inference engine with Soul learning and model management

BitLlama Desktop is a Tauri 2.0 + Svelte desktop application for local LLM inference.
Features include streaming chat, model browser with download, Soul learning (drag & drop,
correction learning), TTT adaptive inference, hardware auto-detection, and i18n (EN/JP).
Full Changelog: v0.15.0...v0.16.0
